## Public Member Functions

### emit() {#a7e6b2c791986011c32c7a0d37739bd49}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void BitstreamRemarkSerializer::emit (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">Remark</a> &amp; Remark)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit a remark to the stream.

This also emits the metadata associated to the remarks based on the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/remarks/#ae5b0a3a7cf356fc6c7602b8279061a66">SerializerMode</a> specified at construction. This writes the serialized output to the provided stream.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h/#l00146">146</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h">BitstreamRemarkSerializer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-cpp/#l00350">350</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-cpp">BitstreamRemarkSerializer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### metaSerializer() {#abc127a6ed6eab26d127985ec8c38ef0f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; MetaSerializer &gt; BitstreamRemarkSerializer::metaSerializer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &gt; ExternalFilename=std::nullopt)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
The metadata serializer associated to this remark serializer.

Based on the container type of the current serializer, the container type of the metadata serializer will change.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h/#l00150">150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h">BitstreamRemarkSerializer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-cpp/#l00371">371</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-cpp">BitstreamRemarkSerializer.cpp</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### DidSetUp {#a4b04e17884b4aab23e73cf48d515d1b5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::remarks::BitstreamRemarkSerializer::DidSetUp = false">
The file should contain: 1) The block info block that describes how to read the blocks.

2) The metadata block that contains various information about the remarks in the file. 3) A number of remark blocks. We need to set up 1) and 2) first, so that we can emit 3) after. This flag is used to emit the first two blocks only once.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h/#l00133">133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h">BitstreamRemarkSerializer.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Helper {#a65ad27a674514a190c2417b69a79c65c}

The helper to emit bitstream.
